subject: Sony Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova rallied from a break down in the first set to oust Petra Kvitova, 7-5, 6-1, to earn a spot in the semifinals of the Sony Open in Key Biscayne, Fla.
snippet: Maria Sharapova rallied from a break down in the first set to oust Petra Kvitova, 7-5, 6-1, to earn a spot in the semifinals of the Sony Open in Key Biscayne, Fla.
